title: Listen: James Blake's BBC Essential Mix
body: It’s been a busy week for **[James Blake.](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/4358-review-james-blake-james-blake/ "Review: James Blake – James Blake")** As well as premiering a new [track](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/11245-new-james-blake-not-long-enough/ "New: James Blake: Not Long Enough") from his highly anticipated new EP, **_Enough Thunder_**, he also played a high profile slot at the infamous LA club **Low End Theory**. To end the week in style he spun a mix in the early hours of yesterday morning for **Radio 1**’s essential mix series. As well as dropping a slew of his favourite tracks, he also played some new and unreleased material of his own. The mix is well worth a listen, follow the **[link](http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b014f718)** to stream the mix in full.

excerpt.full: It’s been a busy week for James Blake. As well as premiering a new track from his highly anticipated new EP, Enough Thunder, he also played a high profile slot at the infamous LA club Low End Theory. To end the week in style he spun a mix in the early hours of yesterday morning \[…\]
excerpt.short: It’s been a busy week for James Blake.
